Description.Text: Located in Leith, Victoria Park Hotel is a perfect starting point from which to explore Edinburgh. The hotel offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. Free Wi-Fi in all rooms, daily housekeeping, fax machine, fireplace, photocopying are on the list of things guests can enjoy. Some of the well-appointed guestrooms feature closet, carpeting, mirror, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary). The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Discover all Edinburgh has to offer by making Victoria Park Hotel your base.
